story_parts.text: The stormtrooper was on a mission to steal some valuable data from the enemy base. He was armed with a blaster and a thermal detonator. He had to be careful not to be seen by the enemy guards. He managed to sneak into the base and find the data. He was about to leave when he heard someone coming. He hid behind a crate and waited for the person to pass.

next_options.0: The stormtrooper waits for the person to pass, then makes a run for it
next_options.1: The stormtrooper jumps out and blasts the person

story_parts.text: The stormtrooper waits for the person to pass, then makes a run for it. He is able to make it back to his ship and leaves the area.

next_options.0: The stormtrooper is quickly apprehended by the authorities and is taken into custody
next_options.1: The stormtrooper is able to make it back to his ship and leaves the area

story_parts.text: The stormtrooper is able to make it back to his ship and leaves the area.

next_options.0: The stormtrooper reports back to his commander, who then sends out a larger force to capture the rebels
next_options.1: The stormtrooper decides to go back and warn the rebels, despite the risk

story_parts.text: The stormtrooper reports back to his commander, who then sends out a larger force to capture the rebels. The rebels are eventually captured and brought back to the base.

next_options.0: The rebels are interrogated and then executed
next_options.1: The rebels are interrogated and then imprisoned

options.1: A soldier in the Rebel Alliance.

quiz_parts.question: What is the definition of the word "force" in the context of the above text?

options.0: An organized body of people with a common purpose
options.1: The use of physical or legal coercion to achieve a desired outcome
options.2: The ability to do work or cause change
options.3: A group of individuals with a common goal or purpose
